refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The glob function searches for all the pathnames matching pattern according to the rules used by the shell. No tilde expansion or parameter substitution is done.
Returns an array containing the matched files/directories or &false; on error.

note.para: This function is disabled in safe mode and therefore will always return &false; in safe mode.

warning.para: This function is not available on the Windows platform.

example.title: Convenient way how glob can replace opendir and friends.
example.para: This could result in the following output:
example.screen: funclist.txt size 44686 funcsummary.txt size 267625 quickref.txt size 137820

refsect1.para: See also opendir, readdir and closedir.
